name: Osgir, the Reconstructor
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{X}, {T}, Exile an artifact with mana value X from your graveyard: Create two tokens that are copies of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Willowdusk, Essence Seer
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Choose another target creature. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you list this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Zaffai, Thunder Conductor
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value is 5 or greater, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. If that spell's mana value is 10 ore greater, Zaffai, Thunder Conductor deals 10 damage to an opponent chosen at random.

name: Storm-Kiln Artist
oracle_text:
Storm-Kiln Artist gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a Treasure token.
flavor_text: A captured elemental makes for a potent, albeit unstable, power source.

name: Lorehold Apprentice
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, Spirit creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent."
flavor_text: Ancient footfalls echo in her head, their timeless rhythm guiding the present.

name: Prismari Apprentice
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Prismari Apprentice can't be blocked this. turn. If that spell has mana value 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Prismari Apprentice.
flavor_text: "No one every created great art by playing it safe."

name: Quandrix Apprentice
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put that card into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "The secrets of our world will be mine."

name: Silverquill Apprentice
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy and instant or sorcery spell, target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: She had spoken the words a hundred times, but under the spotlight, in front of everyone, something new emerged. And the crowd went wild."

name: Witherbloom Apprentice
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "All we are—every feeling, every action—powered by a single, delicate little organ. Life is terrifyingly, beautiful fragile."

name: Professor of Symbology
oracle_text: When Professor of Symbology enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: "A language isn't dead until we stop learning from it."

name: Pop Quiz
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Pest Summoning
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor_text:
"Step 1: Put the pests in mud.
"Step 2: Wait."
—*Gyome's Guide to Pest Breeding*

name: Confront the Past
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target planeswalker card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "Why, Gideon? Of all people, why save me?"

name: Eager First-Year
oracle_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Eager First-Year gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Today, she learns the basics. She'll knock out advanced theory later this week.

name: Archmage Emeritus
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

name: Archmage Emeritus
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

name: Dragonsguard Elite
oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite.
{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.

name: Dragonsguard Elite
oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite.
{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.
flavor_text: "The Founder Dragons brought the Blood Age to an end. It is an honor to serve them."

name: Professor Onyx
oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
+1: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
−3: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.
−8: Each opponent may discard a card. If they don't, they lose 3 life. Repeat this process six more times.

name: Rowan, Scholar of Sparks // Will, Scholar of Frost
type_line: Legendary Planeswalker — Rowan // Legendary Planeswalker — Will

card_faces.name: Rowan, Scholar of Sparks
card_faces.oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
+1: Rowan, Scholar of Sparks deals 1 damage to each opponent. If you've drawn three or more cards this turn, she deals 3 damage to each opponent instead.
−4: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy."

card_faces.name: Will, Scholar of Frost
card_faces.oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
+1: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until your next turn.
−3: Draw two cards.
−7: Exile up to five target permanents. For each permanent exiled this way, its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental Creature token.

name: Whirlwind Denial
oracle_text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor_text:
"If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm."
—*Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft*
